name: B House Restaurant
address: 2270 Commercial Dr, Vancouver, BC V5N 4B5, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Dragon Noodles Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried noodles with blackened chicken leg, prawns, vegetables, crispy garlic, fresh herb.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegan Organic Tofu Bowl (Gs)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten-sensitive. Spicy tempura age dashi organic tofu, Edamame, cucumbers-tomato-kale salad, pineapple, rice, coconut herb dressing, crispy garlic and organic black chia seeds.

hasMenuItem.name: Green Papaya Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free, vegan. Shredded green papaya, kale, carrot, basil-cilantro-mint, candied almond, and pickled ginger vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Belly Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Beer braised pork belly, daikon slaw, cucumber, tomato, pineapple, green onion, soy marinated egg, rice with coconut herb dressing, spicy aioli, sesame seeds, crispy garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: "B" Simple Wings (Gs)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten-sensitive. More than just salt and pepper. Tossed in fresh garlic, chili flakes, fresh jalapeño.

hasMenuItem.name: Red Ahi Tuna Poke Bowl (Gf)
hasMenuItem.description: Gluten free. Spicy sashimi grade red ahi tuna, seaweeds, pickled ginger, red tobiko, pineapple, cucumber-tomato-kale salad, rice with coconut herb dressing, sesame seed, truffle aioli, crispy garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Garlic Soy Wings
hasMenuItem.description: Tossed in sticky sauce, sesame seeds, crispy garlic.

review.reviewBody: I cant say enough things about this restaurant! Honestly I have ordered several times from here and there food just keeps getting better and better. Not only that, the customer service is the best I have ever received from a restaurant. I highly recommend there Green Papaya Salad my absolute fave. It's one of those salads you crave. Thank you B house for being sooo good!
I love B House so much. The dishes are all delicious. The same taste when you go to the restaurant and order it at home. I'm so glad they're on doordash 🤍
